org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

Interface SimEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Identificable, Nameable, Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Datacenter, DatacenterBroker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregateSwitch, CloudCloudSimShutdown, CloudInformationService, CloudSimEntity, DatacenterBrokerAbstract, DatacenterBrokerHeuristic, DatacenterBrokerSimple, DatacenterSimple, EdgeSwitch, NetDatacenterBroker, NetworkDatacenter, PowerDatacenter, PowerDatacenterBroker, PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware, RootSwitch, Switch

    public interface SimEntity
extends Nameable, Cloneable, Runnable
    An interface that represents a simulation entity. An entity handles events and can send events to other entities.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
    See Also:
    CloudSimEntity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Simulation getSimulation()
      Gets the CloudSim instance that represents the simulation the Entity is related to.

    • Method Detail

      • getSimulation

        Simulation getSimulation()
        Gets the CloudSim instance that represents the simulation the Entity is related to.
        Returns:

      • setSimulation

        SimEntity setSimulation(Simulation simulation)
        Sets the CloudSim instance that represents the simulation the Entity is related to.
        Parameters:
        simulation - The CloudSim instance that represents the simulation the Entity is related to
        Returns:

      • processEvent

        void processEvent(SimEvent ev)
        Processes events or services that are available for the entity. This method is invoked by the CloudSim class whenever there is an event in the deferred queue, which needs to be processed by the entity.
        Parameters:
        ev - information about the event just happened
        Precondition:
        ev != null
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • run

        void run()
        The run loop to process events fired during the simulation. The events that will be processed are defined in the processEvent(SimEvent) method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        See Also:
        processEvent(SimEvent)

      • startEntity

        void startEntity()
        This method is invoked by the CloudSim class when the simulation is started. It should be responsible for starting the entity up.

      • shutdownEntity

        void shutdownEntity()
        Shuts down the entity. This method is invoked by the CloudSim before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.

      • setName

        SimEntity setName(String newName)
           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the Entity name.
        Parameters:
        newName - the new name
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the entity name is null or empty
